actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to amend the Bank Holding Company Act of 1956, to prohibit bank holding companies from owning or controlling shares of building and loan, savings and loan, and homestead associations and cooperative banks.

summary.text: Prohibits bank holding companies from owning or controlling shares of building and loan, savings and loan, and homestead associations and cooperative banks. (Amends 12 U.S.C. 1843(c)(8))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Bank Holding Company Act of 1956, to prohibit bank holding companies from owning or controlling shares of building and loan, savings and loan, and homestead associations and cooperative banks.
